Welcome to the family! My name is Ray Klubnik, owner and president of Hot Tub Liquidators. Thank you for this opportunity to expound on my personal history and the culture of our operation. I promise you that once you own one of our spas, your satisfaction is our number one priority!

Since a very young age, I have been a member of my family business in Cleveland, Ohio. We just celebrated our 49th year! At that time, I did not realize the core business values being instilled into me by my parents and siblings. I learned that consistency and accountability are essential aspects of a successful business. In addition, it was proven to me that hard work, integrity, and operational business ethics are also imperative for a business to thrive.

As Vice President of the family business in Cleveland, I was proud to be in charge of corporate promises & business development. I learned how to be accountable and how to protect our client’s investment. I also participated in founding several product retail sub-divisions in our company.

In 1985, I championed the addition of Portable Hot Tubs to our business offer. As a result, we experienced eighteen years of sales growth & irreplaceable service experience. We delivered over 4,000 spas during that time! The desire for Cheryl and I to operate our own business led to the opportunity here in Las Vegas!.

In 2003, my wife Cheryl, daughter Ava, and I relocated our home-base to Las Vegas / Henderson and created our own spa retail operation. We base our extreme success in this spa market to a commitment of industry excellence, integrity in our word & Premium – “Best of Class” products. We are one of the few dealers in town that offer our own in-house service department in order to protect your spa investment!

Our focus is to provide a blend of New & Pre-Owned Premium Hot Tubs that satisfies the client’s every budget. Whether you’re a first time buyer shopping a 110vt. Dream Maker Spa, or the average shopper looking to purchase a “Tropic Seas” value leader hot tub built here in Las Vegas, or perhaps the experienced spa soaker looking for “The World’s Best Built” “Coast Spas” brand hot tubs, we have the right spa for you.

Our spas range from $1,500 to $20,000 and beyond. Like I said, “A Spa for Every Budget!” We offer financing for all levels of credit. We are extremely proud of our 14 Year A+ Better Business Bureau “Honor Roll” Rating & our “Five Star” Yelp Score! Both reporting agencies are 100% consumer driven!

We offer professional presentation on safety, efficiency, construction and exclusive features available in the Hot Tub industry today. Stop by our “must-see” showroom at 129 N. Gibson Rd., Henderson, NV 89014. E-mail me at ray@hottubliquidators.com or call my cell at 702-303-8836 or our showroom at 702-450-7727.

Sincerely,
Ray Klubnik
Owner Operator

“We Promise to Honor You & Protect Your Investment!”

– Ava, Cheryl & Ray Klubnik

Ray & Donetta Klubnik

“Thank You Mom & Dad! Without your support, good will & love, we would have never experienced this incredible 30 yr. success story! You believed in me & shared my dreams when the rest of the world wasn’t listening!
I Love You Both!”
